SkinHelpers
struct
SkinHelpers

Exposes various methods to work with 3dsmax's Skin modifier.

Functions
isSkinModifierSelected
fn isSkinModifierSelected skin_name:undefined =

Checks if the Skin modifier <skin_name> is selected.

Parameters

skin_name: Optional

Returns

True or False if the skin is selected or not

selectSkinModifier
fn selectSkinModifier skn node_index:1 =

Selects the given skin modifier in the modify panel.

Parameters
skn

The skin modifier to select.

node_index:1

In case there is multiple nodes referencing the skin, set which one to select

Returns

True or False if the skin was selectionned or not

prepareCommandPanelToNewSkin
fn prepareCommandPanelToNewSkin nd =

Prepares the command panel to the creation of a new skin modifier for the given <nd|node> by selecting the baseobject.  If a #Morpher is present on the node, the morpher will be selected as the baseobject so that any skin added will be on top of it.

Parameters
nd

The node to host a new skin.

Returns

void

integerAsBoolean <i>
fn integerAsBoolean i =

Returns a boolean for a given integer. ie  (i > 0) = true, ( i < 0 ) = false

if i > 0 then (true) else (false)
Parameters
i

The integer to convert from

Returns

true/false

booleanAsInteger
fn booleanAsInteger b true_int:1 false_int:0 =

Returns an integer for a given boolean.

if b == true then (true_int) else (false_int)
Parameters
b

The boolean to convert from

true_int:1

The integer value to return if true (defaults to 1)

false_int:0

The integer value to return if false (defaults to 0)

Returns

integer
